head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the ¶ 4 months ¶ ending ¶ 31st March ...

div.p: P79/673, unit 1053, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M. O'Loghlen was acting as Chief Secretary in the absence of Graham Berry in England.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the 4 months ending 31st March 1879.
'30th April 1879' intended? M submitted his next Quarterly Estimate on 28 April; see M to B. O'Loghlan, 28 April 1879 (in this edition as 79-04-28c).

cell.p: Total — Five hundred and ninety three pounds six shillings and eight pence
